DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the rate of surgical site infection between traditional wound care and negative pressure wound therapy. Wounds will be assessed 4-5 days after surgery and at the first clinic visit after surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Negative Pressure Wound Therapy to Reduce Surgical Site Infection
DOC.criteria: Female and male patients 18 years of age or older Scheduled for an elective surgery in either open CRS or open HPBS.
